mapper.select: SELECT m.*, c.LARGE, c.MEDIUM, c.SMALL, c.SUB_CATEGORY FROM MARKET m JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.NUM = c.NUM WHERE ( UPPER(M.PRODUCTNAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{productName}) || '%' )
SELECT m.*, c.LARGE, c.MEDIUM, c.SMALL, c.SUB_CATEGORY, g.* FROM MARKET m JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.NUM = c.NUM JOIN GROUPBUYING g ON m.NUM = g.NUM
SELECT m.*, c.LARGE, c.MEDIUM, c.SMALL, c.SUB_CATEGORY, g.* FROM MARKET m JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.NUM = c.NUM JOIN GROUPBUYING g ON m.NUM = g.NUM
mapper.insert: insert into marketView(vno, id, num, viewDate, visible, PCATEGORY, large, medium, small, sub_category) values(seq_marketView.nextval, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num}, sysdate, 1, #{large} || #{medium} || #{small} || #{sub_category}, #{large}, #{medium}, #{small}, #{sub_category})
mapper.select: SELECT MV.*, M.* FROM MARKETVIEW MV INNER JOIN MARKET M ON MV.NUM = M.NUM WHERE MV.ID = #{id} ORDER BY viewDate DESC
select * from marketView where num = #{num} order by viewDate desc

SELECT M.*, F.Frequency, C.*, G.* FROM MARKET M INNER JOIN ( SELECT NUM, COUNT(*) AS Frequency FROM MARKETVIEW GROUP BY NUM ) F ON M.NUM = F.NUM LEFT JOIN CATEGORY C ON M.NUM = C.NUM LEFT JOIN GROUPBUYING G ON M.NUM = G.NUM -- GROUPBUYING 테이블을 추가한 부분 ORDER BY F.Frequency DESC
SELECT m.*, c.large, c.medium, c.small, c.sub_category FROM MARKET m JOIN CATEGORY c ON m.num = c.num WHERE m.num = #{num}
